author: shv
msg: HDFS-2246. Enable reading a block directly from local file system for a client on the same node as the block file. Contributed by Andrew Purtell, Suresh, Jitendra and Benoy

author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1329462 from trunk for HDFS-3312. In HftpFileSystem, the namenode URI is non-secure but the delegation tokens have to use secure URI.
